about.title: Web Developer
about.intro: Translation. Creation. Communication. These are the words that I think best define my work. Translating texts, elaborating catalogs, writing codes for website, all this implies translation – of a need, a request or even a desire – and the creation of a result, whatever the format. And all this contributes to communication between people. That is where I am.
